readable.title: 2968885599_0672a5f016
readable.content: A man controlling a dog sled approaches another dog sled team in a narrow , snowy passageway between two sets of trees . Dogs performing a sled race Sled and dogs headed towards another group of sled dogs with one loose . Two groups of huskies are running in the snow , each group pulling a man . Two packs of sled dogs meet .
